an8.81:4.1: “Satisampajaññe, bhikkhave, asati satisampajaññavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti hirottappaṃ.
an8.81:4.2: Hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti indriyasaṃvaro.
an8.81:4.3: Indriyasaṃvare asati indriyasaṃvaravipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti sīlaṃ.
an8.81:4.4: Sīle asati sīlavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti sammāsamādhi.
an8.81:4.5: Sammāsamādhimhi asati sammāsamādhivipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ.
an8.81:4.6: Yathābhūtañāṇadassane asati yathābhūtañāṇadassanavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti nibbidāvirāgo.
an8.81:4.7: Nibbidāvirāge asati nibbidāvirāgavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
an8.81:4.9: Tassa papaṭikāpi na pāripūriṃ gacchati, tacopi …
an8.81:4.12: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, satisampajaññe asati satisampajaññavipannassa hatūpanisaṃ hoti hirottappaṃ;
an8.81:4.13: hirottappe asati hirottappavipannassa hatūpaniso hoti … pe …
an8.81:5.1: Satisampajaññe, bhikkhave, sati satisampajaññasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti hirottappaṃ.
an8.81:5.2: Hirottappe sati hirottappasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti indriyasaṃvaro.
an8.81:5.3: Indriyasaṃvare sati indriyasaṃvarasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti sīlaṃ.
an8.81:5.4: Sīle sati sīlasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti sammāsamādhi.
an8.81:5.5: Sammāsamādhimhi sati sammāsamādhisampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ.
an8.81:5.6: Yathābhūtañāṇadassane sati yathābhūtañāṇadassanasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti nibbidāvirāgo.
an8.81:5.7: Nibbidāvirāge sati nibbidāvirāgasampannassa upanisasampannaṃ hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ.
